thread.title: 10 best 'Hotline Bling' dance memes
thread.title_full: 10 best 'Hotline Bling' dance memes | Las Vegas Review-Journal

author: Dave Herrera
title: 10 best 'Hotline Bling' dance memes
text:
Oh, now this is about as good as it's going to get this week. While we know there's so many memes and so little time, trust, these ones are totally worth wasting your time on.
In case you missed it, last night, Drake dropped the video for his latest tune "Hotline Bling," a song that may or may not have been appropriated from a Virginia rapper's single "Cha Cha." It's a nifty enough clip. Nothing too novel, by any means. Essentially it's just Drake dancing. Style over substance.
Meh. Luckily, like everything online, lampoonery eventually follows listlessness, making things infinitely more interesting. Such is the case here. This morning, the world woke up to a new hashtag, #DrakeAlwaysOnBeat, populated with a slew of recontextualized clips, which zero in on a 15-30 second section in which Drake cuts a rug in time with various cuts, from Vince Guaraldi's "Linus and Lucy" to "The Cosby Show" theme song. Page down for the ten best clips posted so far.
10. Al Jarreau - "We're In This Love Together" 
#DrakeAlwaysOnBeat pic.twitter.com/luxyuv3z1u 
— Don Q. Woods(@donqwoods) October 20, 2015 9. “Rug Rats” theme song 
Rugrats Theme (credit: @zapriot ) #DrakeAlwaysOnBeat pic.twitter.com/rBQDes5uhw 
— drake dancing to (@DRAKEDANClNG) October 20, 2015 8. Santana - "Maria Maria" 
This is jokes lol RT @MatthewACherry : #DrakeAlwaysOnBeat Had to do one pic.twitter.com/AwYAxn6Mtz 
— QuantumLeapFitness (@ZEUSofQLF) October 20, 2015 7. Magic System - "1Er Gaou" 
Drake hittin it for the west africans #DrakeAlwaysOnBeat #DrakeIsAlwaysOnBeat pic.twitter.com/N0cYyMDWMt 
— Shak Skellington (@ShakExcellence) October 20, 2015 6. Justin Bieber - "What Do You Mean" 
THIS ONE #DrakeAlwaysOnBeat pic.twitter.com/gJcsq5P5K0 
— Ridz (@clxrityy) October 20, 2015 5. Elvis Crespo - "Suavemente" 
you know it's bout to be lit when you hear “SUAAAAV MEEEENTEEEE” at the family party… #DrakeAlwaysOnBeat pic.twitter.com/iieUGYPS8H 
— nashtygal (@nashtygal) October 20, 2015 4. “Star Wars” cantina interlude 
#DrakeAlwaysOnBeat // @starwars cantina edition pic.twitter.com/u8Gy3Za0Ej 
— jake holland (@jakeholla) October 20, 2015 3. Vince Guaraldi - "Linus and Lucy" 
Yep, I'm done RT @DRAKEDANClNG : The Charlie Brown Theme #DrakeAlwaysOnBeat #DrakeIsAlwaysOnBeat pic.twitter.com/gihkI1rqkJ 
— LowKeyUHTN (@LowKeyUHTN) October 20, 2015 2. Lou Bega - Mambo No. 5 (A Little Bit of...) 
How has nobody done this one yet? #DrakeAlwaysOnBeat #HotlineBling pic.twitter.com/8CO3f6tmlW 
— Brandon Alexander (@brandocalreezy) October 20, 2015 1. "Cosby Show" theme song 
I'm hollering! RT @_yunggKing_ : #DrakeAlwaysOnBeat pic.twitter.com/pkTR1Shq0U 
— ᴅᴏʟʟᴀʀ (@callmedollar) October 20, 2015 Ryan Adams performs Taylor...
